archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1142
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a PO, I want all customers to know about and use My Vodafone app as their primary channel for communicating with Vodafone

properties.value: [CCM] Campaign based on provided information around having app, app features How Comarch supports this process? CCM only? CNS? CCM campaign, but also information at the end of buy journey. [CCM] Supported. CCM can send campaign informing about the app and encouraging to install

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
